title: Verify Account
emailHelpText: Please click the button below and we will send you a link via email that you can use to verify your account.
confirmationHelpText: Good! Now click the button below to finish you account verification.
emailSubmitted: Please check your email for a link that you can use to verify your account.
verified: Your account is verified! You can continue using Skole.
loginText: Please look for a link from your email that you can use to verify your account. If you don't have a link, you may log in and request a new link.
